summary: Two retextures, the Barkeeper Outfit and the Barkeeper Outfit Variant.
descriptionHtml:
Barkeeper Outfit Retextured by Danariel

I\'ve retextured both the Barkeeper Outfit (in blue with brown bodice and skirt) and the Barkeeper Outfit Variant (in Red with Black bodice and skirt.)

INSTALL
Unzip into your Skyrim install folder, located at Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim.

UNINSTALL
Delete the Data/textures/clothes/barkeeper folder.

To obtain for yourself, the item code for the console is:
player.additem 0005B6A1 1 for the Barkeeper Outfit, 

I\'m not sure what the code is for the Variant.

If you\'d rather see more of the red than the blue, just swap file names.

You may do with this file what you will, but if you post it elsewhere or use it in something else, I\'d like a little credit.
author: Danariel
